data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: June, Katie, and Sam went to pick strawberries at the farm on the edge of town. They ____ up ____ more ____ ten ____ of ____! They ____ planning ____ to ____ them ____. Katie ____ to ____ strawberry ____ cream. June and Sam will be making some jam this weekend.
data.partBlankContent: June, Katie, and Sam went to pick strawberries at the farm on the edge of town. They en___ up wi__ more th__ ten pou___ of strawb______! They a__ planning h__ to u__ them n__. Katie wa___ to ma__ strawberry i__ cream. June and Sam will be making some jam this weekend.
data.fullContent: June, Katie, and Sam went to pick strawberries at the farm on the edge of town. They ended up with more than ten pounds of strawberries! They are planning how to use them now. Katie wants to make strawberry ice cream. June and Sam will be making some jam this weekend.
data.answer: 琼、凯蒂和萨姆去小镇边上的农场摘草莓。最后他们得到了超过10磅的草莓!他们现在正在计划如何使用它们。凯蒂想做草莓冰淇淋。琼和萨姆这个周末要做果酱。
